title.narrative: Interventions principales pour développer des systèmes et des services pour OVC
Key Interventions to Develop Systems and Services for OVC

description.narrative: (Cameroon): This mechanism will support implementation of SMC in eligible health districts in the North and Far North Regions of Cameroon, including four dose administrations from July to September 2018, with costs covering planning, training, implementation, supervision, monitoring, SBCC, and advocacy.

(Le Cameroun) : Ce mécanisme soutiendra l'exécution de SMC dans les secteurs éligibles de santé dans les régions du nord et loin du nord du Cameroun, y compris quatre administrations de dose de juillet à septembre 2018, avec des coûts couvrant la planification, la formation, l'exécution, la surveillance, la surveillance, le SBCC, et la recommandation.

Objectives for Cameroon: Program Objectives: Improve parenting and family investment to address the essential needs of children in their care. Increase the use of essential services by program beneficiaries that will result in the improved wellbeing of children orphaned or made vulnerable by HIV/AIDS.
